Persons Entitled to Gratuitous Benefits in PFOP and Accrued Lump Sum
For death occurring on or after July 25, 1962, the classes of eligible payees for both PFOP and accrued lump sum are identical.
Brothers, sisters, and non-dependent parents are
not
and never have been entitled to PFOP accrued on the basis of relationship.
